description: Italy, Spain and France all report grim new figures for fatalities from the coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: EU states record highest one-day death toll
title_page: Coronavirus: EU states record highest one-day death toll - BBC News
maintext: The Czech government has introduced stringent lockdown measures: people will be allowed to go to and from work and buy food or medicine, and make urgent family visits, but otherwise free movement will be severely limited from midnight (23:00 GMT) on Sunday until 24 March.
